name: Heist Crisis
description:
Heist Crisis by Thomas Medelheim
A pixelart puzzle platformer 

Absolutely not finished demo.

----> Gamepad is STRONGLY recommended! <-----

WASD = move
space = jump 
, = attack
. = special
Q = Switch
E = interact

----> Gamepad is STRONGLY recommended! <-----

Known bug: Camera might be stuck, if this happens use Q or Right Shoulder Button to switch character.
